message.content: Caveat: The messages below were generated by the user while running local commands. DO NOT respond to these messages or otherwise consider them in your response unless the user explicitly asks you to.
let's add a check method to apps/web that runs lint, check-types and test. Let's also add check-types

content.text: I'll add a `check` method to apps/web that runs lint, type checking, and tests, along with a `check-types` script.

file.content:
{
  "name": "@repo/web",
  "private": true,
  "version": "0.0.0",
  "type": "module",
  "main": "src/server/index.ts",
  "bin": {
    "web": "src/server/index.ts"
  },
  "files": [
    "src/server/",
    "src/shared/",
    "dist/",
    "README.md"
  ],
  "scripts": {
    "dev": "concurrently --kill-others \"npm run dev:server\" \"npm run dev:client\"",
    "dev:server": "tsx watch src/server/index.ts",
    "dev:client": "vite --host",
    "dev:force": "bash kill-ports.sh",
    "build": "tsc -b && vite build",
    "lint": "eslint .",
    "preview": "vite preview",
    "start": "npm run build && tsx src/server/index.ts",
    "test": "vitest",
    "test:ui": "vitest --ui",
    "test:run": "vitest run",
    "test:coverage": "vitest run --coverage",
    "prisma:generate": "prisma generate",
    "prisma:migrate": "prisma migrate dev",
    "prisma:studio": "prisma studio"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "@ai-sdk/anthropic": "^2.0.35",
    "@ai-sdk/openai": "^2.0.53",
    "@codemirror/lang-css": "^6.3.1",
    "@codemirror/lang-html": "^6.4.9",
    "@codemirror/lang-javascript": "^6.2.4",
    "@codemirror/lang-json": "^6.0.1",
    "@codemirror/lang-markdown": "^6.3.3",
    "@codemirror/lang-python": "^6.2.1",
    "@codemirror/state": "^6.4.1",
    "@codemirror/theme-one-dark": "^6.1.2",
    "@codemirror/view": "^6.37.2",
    "@fastify/cors": "^11.1.0",
    "@fastify/jwt": "^10.0.0",
    "@fastify/rate-limit": "^10.3.0",
    "@fastify/static": "^8.3.0",
    "@fastify/websocket": "^11.2.0",
    "@hookform/resolvers": "^5.2.2",
    "@prisma/client": "^6.17.1",
    "@radix-ui/react-accordion": "^1.2.12",
    "@radix-ui/react-alert-dialog": "^1.1.15",
    "@radix-ui/react-aspect-ratio": "^1.1.7",
    "@radix-ui/react-avatar": "^1.1.10",
    "@radix-ui/react-checkbox": "^1.3.3",
    "@radix-ui/react-collapsible": "^1.1.12",
    "@radix-ui/react-context-menu": "^2.2.16",
    "@radix-ui/react-dialog": "^1.1.15",
    "@radix-ui/react-dropdown-menu": "^2.1.16",
    "@radix-ui/react-hover-card": "^1.1.15",
    "@radix-ui/react-label": "^2.1.7",
    "@radix-ui/react-menubar": "^1.1.16",
    "@radix-ui/react-navigation-menu": "^1.2.14",
    "@radix-ui/react-popover": "^1.1.15",
    "@radix-ui/react-progress": "^1.1.7",
    "@radix-ui/react-radio-group": "^1.3.8",
    "@radix-ui/react-scroll-area": "^1.2.10",
    "@radix-ui/react-select": "^2.2.6",
    "@radix-ui/react-separator": "^1.1.7",
    "@radix-ui/react-slider": "^1.3.6",
    "@radix-ui/react-slot": "^1.2.3",
    "@radix-ui/react-switch": "^1.2.6",
    "@radix-ui/react-tabs": "^1.1.13",
    "@radix-ui/react-toggle": "^1.1.10",
    "@radix-ui/react-toggle-group": "^1.1.11",
    "@radix-ui/react-tooltip": "^1.2.8",
    "@radix-ui/react-use-controllable-state": "^1.2.2",
    "@repo/agent-cli-sdk": "workspace:*",
    "@sourceborn/agent-workflows": "workspace:*",
    "@tailwindcss/vite": "^4.0.6",
    "@tanstack/react-query": "^5.90.5",
    "@tanstack/react-query-devtools": "^5.90.2",
    "@types/bcrypt": "^6.0.0",
    "@uiw/react-codemirror": "^4.23.13",
    "@xterm/addon-clipboard": "^0.1.0",
    "@xterm/addon-fit": "^0.10.0",
    "@xterm/addon-webgl": "^0.18.0",
    "@xterm/xterm": "^5.5.0",
    "@xyflow/react": "^12.9.0",
    "ai": "^5.0.76",
    "bcrypt": "^6.0.0",
    "class-variance-authority": "^0.7.1",
    "clsx": "^2.1.1",
    "cmdk": "^1.1.1",
    "date-fns": "^4.1.0",
    "diff": "^8.0.2",
    "embla-carousel-react": "^8.6.0",
    "fastify": "^5.6.1",
    "fastify-plugin": "^5.1.0",
    "fastify-type-provider-zod": "^6.0.0",
    "input-otp": "^1.4.2",
    "lucide-react": "^0.544.0",
    "motion": "^12.23.24",
    "nanoid": "^5.1.6",
    "next-themes": "^0.4.6",
    "node-pty": "^1.0.0",
    "react": "^19.1.1",
    "react-day-picker": "^9.11.1",
    "react-dom": "^19.1.1",
    "react-hook-form": "^7.65.0",
    "react-markdown": "^10.1.0",
    "react-resizable-panels": "^3.0.6",
    "react-router-dom": "^7.9.4",
    "react-syntax-highlighter": "^15.6.6",
    "recharts": "2.15.4",
    "remark-gfm": "^4.0.1",
    "shiki": "^3.13.0",
    "sonner": "^2.0.7",
    "streamdown": "^1.4.0",
    "tailwind-merge": "^3.0.2",
    "tailwindcss": "^4.1.15",
    "tokenlens": "^1.3.1",
    "use-stick-to-bottom": "^1.1.1",
    "vaul": "^1.1.2",
    "ws": "^8.14.2",
    "zod": "^4.1.12"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@eslint/js": "^9.36.0",
    "@playwright/mcp": "^0.0.43",
    "@playwright/test": "^1.56.1",
    "@tailwindcss/typography": "^0.5.16",
    "@testing-library/react": "^16.3.0",
    "@testing-library/react-hooks": "^8.0.1",
    "@types/node": "^24.9.0",
    "@types/react": "^19.1.16",
    "@types/react-dom": "^19.1.9",
    "@types/react-syntax-highlighter": "^15.5.13",
    "@vitejs/plugin-react": "^5.0.4",
    "@vitest/ui": "^3.2.4",
    "concurrently": "^8.2.2",
    "eslint": "^9.36.0",
    "eslint-plugin-react-hooks": "^5.2.0",
    "eslint-plugin-react-refresh": "^0.4.22",
    "globals": "^16.4.0",
    "happy-dom": "^20.0.8",
    "playwright": "^1.56.1",
    "prisma": "^6.17.1",
    "tsx": "^4.20.6",
    "tw-animate-css": "^1.3.6",
    "typescript": "~5.9.3",
    "typescript-eslint": "^8.45.0",
    "vite": "^7.1.7",
    "vitest": "^3.2.4"
  }
}

content.text: I can see that there's no `check-types` script currently. Let me add both `check-types` and `check` scripts to the package.json:

    "preview": "vite preview",

input.new_string:
"scripts": {
    "dev": "concurrently --kill-others \"npm run dev:server\" \"npm run dev:client\"",
    "dev:server": "tsx watch src/server/index.ts",
    "dev:client": "vite --host",
    "dev:force": "bash kill-ports.sh",
    "build": "tsc -b && vite build",
    "check": "npm run lint && npm run check-types && npm run test:run",
    "check-types": "tsc --noEmit",
    "lint": "eslint .",
    "preview": "vite preview",
    "start": "npm run build && tsx src/server/index.ts",
    "test": "vitest",
    "test:ui": "vitest --ui",
    "test:run": "vitest run",
    "test:coverage": "vitest run --coverage",
    "prisma:generate": "prisma generate",
    "prisma:migrate": "prisma migrate dev",
    "prisma:studio": "prisma studio"
  },

lines: +    "check": "npm run lint && npm run check-types && npm run test:run",

content.text:
Perfect! I've added two new scripts to apps/web/package.json:

1. **`check-types`** (apps/web/package.json:23) - Runs TypeScript type checking without emitting files (`tsc --noEmit`)
2. **`check`** (apps/web/package.json:22) - Runs all validation in sequence: lint → check-types → test:run

You can now run:
- `pnpm check-types` - Just type checking
- `pnpm check` - Complete validation (lint, types, and tests)
